author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9930] Closing the connections in few missed cases in the HBaseToThriftAdapter
Summary: This diff attempts to close all the ThriftClientManager and Thrift client objects on the client side.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10904] Add Shell command to create table on a set number of region servers.
* Changed the printing of HTD with server set.
* Added ability to create pinned tables from the ruby shell.
* Added the ability to alter tables to pin them from the ruby shell
* Tested creation and altering on local instance.
* Tested re-creating a table from the printed HTD from master web page.

author: liyin
msg: Summary: Remove usage of `createMultiRegions`, call `createTable` with `startKeys` version to create the table with multiple regions directly.

author: liyin
msg: The bug was introduced by `HBaseTestingUtility.createMultiRegions` and his friends. Use `createTable` with multi regions to replace it.

author: liyin
msg: this test is consistently passing for me and I cannot see it
